cmb:
MANA COST: 80/90/100/110
COOLDOWN: 16/14/12/10
desc: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
lore: Mogul Khan's warcry taunts opponents into engaging in an unconquerable battle with the Axe.
name: axe_berserkers_call

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
attrib:
DURATION: 10
MOVEMENT SLOW: 12%
SPEED BONUS: 10%
cmb:
MANA COST: 75
COOLDOWN: 20/15/10/5
desc: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. Axe gains movement speed for each unit affected with Battle Hunger.
notes:
Killing illusions or destroying buildings will also remove the debuff.
Units affected by Battle Hunger cannot be denied.
lore: Ordinary heroes cannot withstand Mogul Khan's rage for battle, such that it injures them until it is satisfied.
name: axe_battle_hunger

cmb: COOLDOWN: 0.45/0.40/0.35/0.30
desc: When attacked, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing damage to all nearby enemies.
notes: Counter Helix checks for triggering whenever an attack against Axe begins, not when Axe is actually damaged by said attack.
lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.
name: axe_counter_helix

affects:

DAMAGE: Magical
attrib:
KILL THRESHOLD: 250 / 350 / 450
DAMAGE: 150 / 250 / 300
SPEED BONUS: 40%
SPEED DURATION: 6
SPEED RADIUS: 900
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 6 / 6 / 6
SCEPTER KILL THRESHOLD: 300 / 450 / 625
SCEPTER SPEED DURATION: 10
cmb:
MANA COST: 60/120/180
COOLDOWN: 75/65/55
desc:
Axe spots weakness and strikes, dealing moderate damage but instantly killing an enemy unit with low health. When an enemy hero is killed in this way, the cooldown is reset and Axe and nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes: The killing blow goes through magic immunity. Blockes by Linken's Sphere.
lore: Mogul Khan is the embodiment of battle and fury, launching into a gruesome fatality against those who dare engage the Axe in combat.
name: axe_culling_blade
